newCars.description: The 2024 Honda Civic is a bold step forward for the iconic sedan, featuring an athletic yet sophisticated design with an emphasis on performance, comfort, and technology. As the fastest Civic ever, it brings a thrilling driving experience with advanced safety features and modern tech that caters to both enthusiasts and daily commuters.

features.engine: 2.0L Turbocharged 4-cylinder
features.infotainment: 7-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration
features.safety: Honda Sensing® Suite, including Collision Mitigation Braking System (CMBS) and Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC)
features.comfort: Dual-zone climate control, heated front seats, and a spacious, tech-forward interior

design.exterior: The exterior boasts a low, wide stance with sleek lines and aggressive styling, including LED headlights and taillights, a blacked-out front grille, and available 18-inch alloy wheels.
design.interior: The cabin is driver-centric, with a minimalist dashboard design and a premium feel, thanks to soft-touch materials, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and customizable ambient lighting.

performance.handling: Precisely tuned suspension for enhanced cornering and stability, ensuring a smooth yet exhilarating ride.
performance.drivingModes: Eco, Normal, and Sport modes to suit various driving preferences.

technology.audio: Premium 8-speaker sound system
technology.connectivity: Bluetooth, USB ports, wireless charging, and a digital instrument cluster
technology.driverAssistance: Rearview camera, lane-keeping assist, and traffic sign recognition

newCars.description: The 2024 Toyota Corolla is a stylish and reliable sedan that blends fun driving dynamics with modern technology and safety features. Its eye-catching design and efficient performance make it an ideal choice for both urban commuting and weekend adventures.

features.engine: 1.8L 4-cylinder
features.infotainment: 8-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration
features.safety: Toyota Safety Sense™ 2.5, including Pre-Collision System and Lane Departure Alert
features.comfort: Automatic climate control, spacious rear seats, and a user-friendly interior layout

design.exterior: The exterior features a bold front grille, sleek profile, and available 18-inch alloy wheels, giving it a sporty and modern appearance.
design.interior: The interior is designed with premium materials, a comfortable seating arrangement, and a focus on driver ergonomics, ensuring a pleasant driving experience.

performance.handling: Tuned suspension for balanced ride comfort and sporty handling, making it agile in city driving.
performance.drivingModes: Eco and Sport modes to enhance driving experience based on preferences.

technology.audio: 6-speaker audio system with a premium option available
technology.connectivity: Bluetooth, USB ports, and wireless charging capabilities
technology.driverAssistance: Adaptive Cruise Control, Blind Spot Monitoring, and Rear Cross Traffic Alert

newCars.description: The 2024 Ford Mustang is a legendary sports car that combines iconic styling with cutting-edge performance. Known for its exhilarating power and dynamic handling, the Mustang delivers an unmatched driving experience, making it the perfect choice for enthusiasts and everyday drivers alike.

features.engine: 5.0L V8 or 2.3L EcoBoost 4-cylinder
features.fuelEfficiency: 15 MPG city / 24 MPG highway (V8) / 21 MPG city / 30 MPG highway (EcoBoost)
features.infotainment: 12-inch digital instrument cluster and SYNC 4 with an 8-inch touchscreen
features.safety: Ford Co-Pilot360, including Pre-Collision Assist, Blind Spot Information System, and Lane-Keeping Assist
features.comfort: Available heated and ventilated front seats, spacious cabin, and premium sound system

design.exterior: The exterior features an aggressive front grille, aerodynamic lines, and available performance packages that enhance its sporty look.
design.interior: The interior is driver-focused, featuring a modern dashboard layout, high-quality materials, and customizable ambient lighting.

performance.handling: Advanced suspension system for improved cornering stability and responsive handling.
performance.drivingModes: Normal, Sport, and Track modes for tailored driving experiences.

technology.audio: Available B&O Sound System with 12 speakers
technology.connectivity: Bluetooth, USB ports, wireless charging, and FordPass Connect with 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot capability
technology.driverAssistance: Adaptive Cruise Control, Rear Parking Sensors, and Active Park Assist

newCars.description: The 2024 Chevrolet Silverado is a powerful and versatile pickup truck that excels in both work and leisure. With its robust design, advanced technology, and impressive towing capacity, the Silverado is engineered to handle any job while providing comfort and convenience for everyday driving.

features.engine: 2.7L Turbocharged 4-cylinder or 5.3L V8
features.fuelEfficiency: 20 MPG city / 23 MPG highway (Turbo) / 16 MPG city / 22 MPG highway (V8)
features.infotainment: Chevrolet Infotainment 3 system with a 13.4-inch touchscreen and wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
features.safety: Available Chevrolet Safety Assist, including Automatic Emergency Braking, Forward Collision Alert, and Lane Keep Assist
features.comfort: Spacious interior with available heated and ventilated seats, dual-zone climate control, and premium materials

design.exterior: The Silverado's bold and rugged design features a high-strength steel frame, LED lighting, and an available Multi-Flex tailgate for enhanced utility.
design.interior: A driver-centric cockpit with intuitive controls, ample storage solutions, and high-quality materials for a refined feel.

performance.towingCapacity: Up to 13,300 lbs when properly equipped, making it ideal for heavy-duty tasks.
performance.drivingModes: Available driving modes for optimized performance in various conditions, including Tow/Haul mode.

technology.audio: Bose premium sound system for an enhanced audio experience
technology.connectivity: Multiple USB ports, Bluetooth, and available Wi-Fi hotspot capability for on-the-go connectivity.
technology.driverAssistance: Available adaptive cruise control, rear park assist, and a high-definition rear vision camera

newCars.description: The 2024 Tesla Model 3 is a cutting-edge electric sedan that combines impressive performance with advanced technology. Available in Standard Range and Long Range variants, it delivers a thrilling driving experience while minimizing environmental impact. With its minimalist interior and high-tech features, the Model 3 redefines what a modern sedan can be.

features.battery: Standard Range: 54 kWh; Long Range: 75 kWh
features.range: Standard Range: 263 miles; Long Range: 353 miles on a full charge
features.infotainment: 15-inch touchscreen with navigation, streaming services, and over-the-air updates
features.safety: Five-star safety rating, with advanced safety features including Automatic Emergency Braking and Lane Departure Avoidance
features.comfort: Spacious cabin with vegan leather seating, heated front and rear seats, and dual-zone climate control

design.exterior: The Model 3 features a sleek, aerodynamic design with a low profile, flush door handles, and a minimalist aesthetic.
design.interior: A spacious, modern interior that emphasizes simplicity and technology, featuring a central touchscreen and premium materials.

performance.acceleration: 0-60 mph in as little as 5.3 seconds (Standard) / 3.1 seconds (Long Range Performance variant)
performance.handling: All-wheel drive available, providing superior traction and handling capabilities.
performance.drivingModes: Standard and Sport driving modes to enhance performance based on driver preference.

technology.audio: Premium audio system with immersive sound quality
technology.connectivity: Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, and cellular connectivity for internet access and streaming capabilities
technology.driverAssistance: Autopilot capabilities with advanced features for semi-autonomous driving

newCars.description: The 2024 Hyundai Elantra is a bold compact sedan that blends cutting-edge technology with eye-catching design. Featuring streamlined styling and a spacious interior, the Elantra is equipped with the latest tech to enhance your driving experience. With a focus on safety, performance, and comfort, it’s the perfect companion for every journey.

features.engine: 2.0L 4-cylinder engine
features.infotainment: 10.25-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
features.safety: SmartSense safety features including Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist and Lane Keeping Assist
features.comfort: Spacious interior with comfortable seating, dual-zone climate control, and available heated front seats

design.exterior: The Elantra showcases a sleek and modern silhouette with a bold front grille, sharp LED headlights, and dynamic character lines.
design.interior: A contemporary interior that emphasizes driver comfort and convenience, featuring high-quality materials and an intuitive layout.

performance.handling: Responsive steering and well-tuned suspension for a balanced driving experience.
performance.drivingModes: Selectable driving modes to enhance performance and efficiency.

technology.audio: Bose premium audio system available for enhanced sound quality
technology.connectivity: Bluetooth, USB ports, wireless charging, and advanced navigation features
technology.driverAssistance: Highway Driving Assist and Blind-Spot Collision-Avoidance Assist for added safety

newCars.description: The 2024 Kia Sportage redefines adventure with its bold design and spacious interior. Featuring advanced technology and a powerful engine, it’s built for those who crave exploration. With versatile seating and ample cargo space, the Sportage is perfect for family outings or solo adventures, ensuring you can tackle any terrain with confidence.

features.engine: 2.5L 4-cylinder engine
features.infotainment: 12.3-inch dual display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
features.safety: Kia Drive Wise technology including Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist and Blind-Spot Monitoring

technology.connectivity: Multiple USB ports, wireless charging, and smart device integration for seamless connectivity
technology.driverAssistance: Surround View Monitor and Smart Cruise Control to enhance safety and convenience

newCars.description: The 2024 Subaru Outback combines rugged capability with refined comfort, making it the perfect companion for all your adventures. With its spacious interior, advanced safety features, and Subaru's legendary all-wheel drive, it’s designed for those who embrace the outdoors and value practicality in their daily lives.

features.engine: 2.5L 4-cylinder engine or 2.4L turbocharged engine
features.infotainment: 11.6-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
features.safety: EyeSight Driver Assist Technology, including Adaptive Cruise Control and Lane Keep Assist
features.comfort: Spacious seating with available leather-trimmed upholstery and heated front seats

design.exterior: The Outback features rugged styling with high ground clearance, a distinctive front grille, and LED headlights, making it perfect for both city and off-road environments.

performance.handling: Symmetrical All-Wheel Drive for superior traction and stability on various surfaces.

technology.audio: Harman Kardon premium audio system for an exceptional listening experience
technology.connectivity: Multiple USB ports, Bluetooth connectivity, and Wi-Fi hotspot capability
technology.driverAssistance: Reverse automatic braking, blind-spot detection, and rear cross-traffic alert for added safety

newCars.description: The 2024 Nissan Altima stands out with its striking design and sporty performance. With its efficient engines, advanced technology, and spacious interior, it offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and innovative features to elevate your driving experience.

features.engine: 2.5L 4-cylinder engine or 2.0L turbocharged engine

newCars.description: The 2024 Audi Q5 is a luxury SUV that masterfully combines elegant styling with exceptional practicality. Its sophisticated design and versatile interior make it an ideal choice for both city driving and outdoor adventures, while its advanced technology ensures a connected and enjoyable experience on the road.

features.engine: 2.0L TFSI® inline 4-cylinder turbocharged engine
features.transmission: 7-speed S tronic® automatic transmission with quattro® all-wheel drive
features.infotainment: 10.1-inch touchscreen display with MMI® Navigation plus and Apple CarPlay/Android Auto
features.safety: Audi pre sense® basic, Audi lane departure warning, and adaptive cruise control
features.comfort: Heated leather seats, panoramic sunroof, and a spacious cargo area with split-folding rear seats

design.interior: The cabin showcases premium materials, customizable ambient lighting, and a driver-centric layout for maximum comfort.

technology.connectivity: Multiple USB-C ports, Bluetooth connectivity, and an optional Wi-Fi hotspot

usedCars.description: The 2018 Honda Civic is a well-maintained, fuel-efficient sedan that offers a comfortable ride and reliable performance. Its sleek design, advanced safety features, and spacious interior make it a perfect choice for daily commuting and family trips.
